name: DJ Python (XL Recordings) & Posner /BLÅ
description:
DJ Python (XL Recordings) & Posner
Fredag 8. mai | 23:00 | Id: 20 | cc: 180,-
leftfield / house / breakbeat

DJ Python (XL Recordings)

DJ Python er hovedaliaset til Queens-baserte DJ og produsent Brian Piñeyro. En DJ av høy rang som har gode kvaliteter på tvers av sjangre og stemninger. Spilt for blant annet Dekmantel, NTS og Nuit Sonores. Han ga nylig ut EPen 'i was put on this earth' på XL Recordings.

Posner

Oslo-basert DJ og produsent, kjent for sin ambient take på sjangre som footwork og breakbeat. Hans prosjekt 'thought this might be a good time' har blitt spilt på radioer som NTS og listet av Warp Records på deres Weekly Selections spilleliste.

//

DJ Python (XL Recordings)

DJ Python is the main alias of Queens-based DJ and producer Brian Piñeyro. A highly regarded DJ with a strong sensibility across genres and moods, he has performed for platforms and events such as Dekmantel, NTS and Nuit Sonores. He recently released the EP i was put on this earth on XL Recordings.

Posner

Oslo-based DJ and producer known for his ambient take on genres such as footwork and breakbeat. His project 'thought this might be a good time' has been played on radio stations across the world including NTS and was featured by Warp Records in their Weekly Selections playlist.
